description: Being nice starts with using ingredients that are good for people while being environmentally responsible. We only use the best all-natural ingredients, organics when possible, and we do our best to source as close to home as possible. Want to know what's in a particular Nicey? Just ask us! We have nothing to hide! Actually, we'd be proud to tell you. We source our organic, grass-fed milk from Trader’s Point Creamery, sweeteners range from agave syrup to organic evaporated cane juice, and our chocolate is from Guittard in San Francisco, California.In the words of my grandfather, “Good ingredients aren’t cheap and cheap ingredients aren’t good.” Right on Gramps!
name: Nicey Treat
